## Overview

Use this class to generate a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] object based on the configuration parameters you provide.

You can use this object in conjunction with other Core Image classes—such as [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext]—to take advantage of the built-in Core Image filters when processing images or writing custom filters.

You can also query this object to find out about the supported camera models, decoders, and filters.

# CIRAWFilter

**Class**

A filter subclass that produces an image by manipulating RAW image sensor data from a digital camera or scanner.

## Declaration

```swift
class CIRAWFilter
```

## Overview

Use this class to generate a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] object based on the configuration parameters you provide.

You can use this object in conjunction with other Core Image classes—such as [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext]—to take advantage of the built-in Core Image filters when processing images or writing custom filters.

You can also query this object to find out about the supported camera models, decoders, and filters.

## Creating a filter

- **init(cvPixelBuffer:properties:)**: Creates a RAW filter from the pixel buffer and its properties that you specify.
- **init(imageData:identifierHint:)**: Creates a RAW filter from the image data and type hint that you specify.
- **init(imageURL:)**: Creates a RAW filter from the image at the URL location that you specify.

## Inspecting supported camera models, decoders, and filters

- **supportedCameraModels**: An array containing the names of all supported camera models.
- **supportedDecoderVersions**: An array of all supported decoder versions for the given image type.
- **CIRAWDecoderVersion**
- **isColorNoiseReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports color noise reduction adjustments.
- **isContrastSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports contrast adjustments.
- **isDetailSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports detail enhancement adjustments.
- **isLensCorrectionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if you can enable lens correction for the current image.
- **isLocalToneMapSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports local tone curve adjustments.
- **isLuminanceNoiseReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports luminance noise reduction adjustments.
- **isMoireReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports moire artifact reduction adjustments.
- **isSharpnessSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports sharpness adjustments.
- **nativeSize**: The full native size of the unscaled image.

## Configuring a filter

- **baselineExposure**: A value that indicates the baseline exposure to apply to the image.
- **boostAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of global tone curve to apply to the image.
- **boostShadowAmount**: A value that indicates the amount to boost the shadow areas of the image.
- **colorNoiseReductionAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of chroma noise reduction to apply to the image.
- **contrastAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of local contrast to apply to the edges of the image.
- **decoderVersion**: A value that indicates the decoder version to use.
- **detailAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of detail enhancement to apply to the edges of the image.
- **exposure**: A value that indicates the amount of exposure to apply to the image.
- **extendedDynamicRangeAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of extended dynamic range (EDR) to apply to the image.
- **isDraftModeEnabled**: A Boolean that indicates whether to enable draft mode.
- **isGamutMappingEnabled**: A Boolean that indicates whether to enable gamut mapping.
- **isLensCorrectionEnabled**: A Boolean that indicates whether to enable lens correction.
- **linearSpaceFilter**: An optional filter you can apply to the RAW image while it’s in linear space.
- **localToneMapAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of local tone curve to apply to the image.
- **luminanceNoiseReductionAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of luminance noise reduction to apply to the image.
- **moireReductionAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of moire artifact reduction to apply to high frequency areas of the image.
- **neutralChromaticity**: A value that indicates the amount of white balance based on chromaticity values to apply to the image.
- **neutralLocation**: A value that indicates the amount of white balance based on pixel coordinates to apply to the image.
- **neutralTemperature**: A value that indicates the amount of white balance based on temperature values to apply to the image.
- **neutralTint**: A value that indicates the amount of white balance based on tint values to apply to the image.
- **orientation**: A value that indicates the orientation of the image.
- **portraitEffectsMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the portrait effects matte of the image.
- **previewImage**: An optional auxiliary image that represents a preview of the original image.
- **properties**: A dictionary that contains properties of the image source.
- **scaleFactor**: A value that indicates the desired scale factor to draw the output image.
- **semanticSegmentationGlassesMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the semantic segmentation glasses matte of the image.
- **semanticSegmentationHairMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the semantic segmentation hair matte of the image.
- **semanticSegmentationSkinMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the semantic segmentation skin matte of the image.
- **semanticSegmentationSkyMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the semantic segmentation sky matte of the image.
- **semanticSegmentationTeethMatte**: An optional auxiliary image that represents the semantic segmentation teeth matte of the image.
- **shadowBias**: A value that indicates the amount to subtract from the shadows in the image.
- **sharpnessAmount**: A value that indicates the amount of sharpness to apply to the edges of the image.

## Instance Properties

- **isHighlightRecoveryEnabled**
- **isHighlightRecoverySupported**

## Filters

- **CIFilter**: An image processor that produces an image by manipulating one or more input images or by generating new image data.
- **CIColor**: The Core Image class that defines a color object.
- **CIVector**: The Core Image class that defines a vector object.

## Inherits From

- CIFilter

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
